title: Septerra Core: Legacy of the Creator
description:
Septerra Core: Legacy of the Creator

Designed by Valkyrie Studios and published by Monolith Productions.

Release Date: October 31 1999

Beautiful CGI and full voice acting gives this RPG a wonderful feel. A rich world with a unique system and good character but limited success tells that this game was ahead of it\&#039;s time. If you like the Final Fantasy series, you will like this.

Seed/Mount/Burn/Enjoy.
